code: import{createSlice}from"@reduxjs/toolkit";import{theme}from"@utils";var initialState={name:"",themeColor:"",subColor:"",logoUrl:""};var colorThemes=theme.colors.colorThemes;var merchant=createSlice({name:"theme",initialState:initialState,reducers:{setMainColor:function setMainColor(state,action){state.themeColor=action.payload;colorThemes.forEach(function(color){if(action.payload===color.main){state.subColor=color.sub;}});},setMerchant:function setMerchant(state,action){return action.payload;}}});export var selectMerchant=function selectMerchant(state){return state.merchant;};var _merchant$actions=merchant.actions,setMainColor=_merchant$actions.setMainColor,setMerchant=_merchant$actions.setMerchant;export{setMainColor,setMerchant};export default merchant.reducer;
